title: Anti-cold Medicine
description: Anti-cold Medicine is a mission item used in Relapse mission. Anti-cold Medicine can be crafted using the following crafting station after the player purchases the recipe at the Fang & X. The recipe only becomes available after Relapse. One Anti-cold Medicine is "crafted" by the player during Relapse. It will be consumed later in the same mission. Anti-cold Medicine is required to complete Relapse mission. It can also be given as gift.
cleaned_text: used in [Relapse](/wiki/Mission:_Relapse) mission.
